Interface MetricSpace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DiscreetField, EuclideanAlgebra, EuclideanFunctionSpace, EuclideanSpace, Field, FiniteDomain, FiniteField, FinitePrimeField, InnerProductSpace, NormedSpace, ParameterizedSpace, PrimeField
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComplexPlane, FiniteDimensionalFunctionSpace, FiniteDimensionalSobolevSpace, FiniteDimensionalVectorSpace, FunctionalSpace, PolynomialFunctionSpace, QuaternionSpace, RealLine, TrigonometricSobolevSpace, TrigonometricSpace

    public interface MetricSpace
extends java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    RoManski a metric space M is a set with elements in a way that a distance function called metric MxM-|R can be defined.

      method for measuring distance between elements

        method for measuring distance between elements
